vote.title: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of a trail easement and two temporary construction easements containing a total of approximately 30,359 square feet of land to the City of Farmers Branch for the construction, maintenance, and use of trail facilities across City-owned land located in Dallas County - Estimated Revenue: Water and Sewer Fund ($24,500.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00)
